content.content: Everything you need to run your SaaS
Clean UX, powerful automation, and dashboards your team will love.
Track KPIs, usage, and revenue in real-time with customizable dashboards.
Flexible plans, proration, and dunning built-in. Integrates with Stripe.
Granular permissions and SSO to keep your workspace secure.
Connect with 50+ tools including Slack, GitHub, and Notion.
Export reports or hook into our API for custom workflows.
Guided setup, templates, and team invites. No code required.
Thousands of teams moved faster with GreenSaaS.
We reduced onboarding time by 60% and our team actually enjoys using the dashboard.
The billing flow paid for itself within the first month. Churn dropped noticeably.
Start free. Upgrade when you grow.
